title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.10 - Storage of clothing and bedding
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7005.10 - Storage of clothing and bedding

State Regulations

All items of clothing and bedding stored within the
facility shall be maintained in a safe and sanitary manner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7005.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
